Articles.Content:
like the title said, my saves when opened up the game and click resumed save there was nothig there and clicked resume save again and nothing happened, so I made a new save, flew to KSC 2 since I was bored and then shut down the game and restarted it and went to click resume save again and the menu showed no saves then I clicked resume save again and nothing help me please. 

 

Edited January 22, 2020 by Dr. Omicron

ok I deleted all the files that where in the KerbalSpaceProgram and reinstalled and still its like that but

http://prntscr.com/qr2evn

 

I have no idea and even though I deleted all the stuff in the KSP folder and reinstalled from steam its still like that can someone help me?

since I uninstalled the mods and its still not working can I put it in the unmodded?
